ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think I have a good low-risk way to test this.  I will have to get myself a gypsy lute.  The cleric will give her lute to the NPC, and I will give the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Jan 2000 kim@... wrote:
>
> Hmm, does this mean my cleric friend (who picked up a gypsy
> lute when I wasn't there) could give the lute to the NPC, and
> I could give the NPC the carapace and ruby lambent, and I
> would get the breastplate?
>
> Do I really want to try this experiment considering it took me
> 3 days to get that damn carapace? Anyone know of a similar,
> easier quest we could test this theory on first?

I think I have a good low-risk way to test this. I will have
to get myself a gypsy lute. The cleric will give her lute to
the NPC, and I will give the other items. If no breastplate,
I will give my lute to get the BP. If I do get a breastplate,
I won't have to make a return trip to MM to get another lute
for general use (+5 magic resist).

I may still test it with the Millers though, just to reassure
myself that this actually has a chance of working.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
